title: Help me identify the font from Yandex
content:
Hello everyone,

I have a simple yet annoying problem. I've seen this font on Yandex, and I can't nor can WhatTheFont identify it for me.

Can anyone help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322033701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/23feb2015-logo-ru_4885.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [23feb2015-logo-ru.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322033701/http:/typophile.com/files/23feb2015-logo-ru.jpg) | 19.31 KB |
author: marxo

comments.content:
Custom for Yandex, by Art Lebedev Studio. See [http://www.artlebedev.com/everything/yandex/type/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322033701/http:/www.artlebedev.com/everything/yandex/type/).  
As it says on the front page, wrong section, repost on [http://typophile.com/fontid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322033701/http:/typophile.com/fontid). Stephan
